industry: Retail and Retail Apparel and Fashion
description:
NOTE: This position is offered as a hybrid role in the Seattle, WA area. You must be willing to work in office at the Nordstrom Seattle office a minimum of 3 days/week in order to be considered for this position. Application Note: In addition to your resume, please include a PDF or link to a portfolio of your work to be considered for this position.
As a Senior Designer of Men’s for one of our Nordstrom Product Group (NPG) brands, you will own the category - conceptualizing, sketching and executing collection ideas that represent the *Brand Ethos* and fashion trends that appeal to the Nordstrom customer. The ideal candidate has experience across different apparel categories, knows how to drive design development, and has an elevated design eye. Experience in contemporary or luxury markets is a plus.

**A day in the life… **
  • Conceptualize, accurately sketch and execute collection ideas that represents target customer
  • Design original and commercially viable product
  • Act as fashion authority to drive brand designs and point of view
  • Manage calendar across design team to ensure all milestones and due dates are met
  • Research materials and components
  • Manage product fit sessions
  • Collaborate with Design Director on color and pattern selection each season
  • Prioritize workload and complex work streams across design team
  • Effectively collaborate with leadership and cross-divisional partners to ensure alignment on priorities and direction
  • Research and analyze trends and competitive brands
  • Manage and develop an efficient and effective design team through performance feedback, goal-setting and development plans

**You own this if you have…**
  • Bachelor’s degree in Design, preferred
  • 7+ years' experience in design industry
  • 2+ years of experience managing a design team, a plus
  • Strong ability to hand-sketch
  • Strong presentation skills
  • Strong understanding of industry and trends along with a keen eye for fabric development and selection
  • Ability to handle high volume of styles
  • Highly organized and detail oriented with strong time management and multi-tasking skills
  • Ability to think strategically and deliver the right level of detail appropriate to the audience
  • Clear and effective written and verbal communication and strong interpersonal skills with ability to work independently or as a team
  • Proficiency in MS Office suite and Adobe CS
  • Ability to manage and develop skills of direct reports

#LI-Hybrid #LI-CH1

Our employees are our most important asset and that’s reflected in our benefits. Nordstrom is proud to offer a variety of benefits to support employees and their families, including:
  • Medical/Vision, Dental, Retirement and Paid Time Away
  • Life Insurance and Disability
  • Merchandise Discount and EAP Resources
